name: Rox's world
description:
Survival, Procedurally generated, Horror, Unity, 3d , weapons, first- person game features are present in Rox's world

Welcome to the Rox's world!!

Kill or die

Good graphics with variety of weapon. I bet you will like its visuals , particle effects and sound effects a lot. Its a very short game made in 10 days. In this game the players tries to survive from creepy and dangerous creatures.  Player needs to complete a small mission and prove himself/herself. 

Watch devlog on Youtube : devmedkit  

Youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvC6U2SAke9kCVU7Mkni5Uw

Made in 10 days :)

Join discord:  https://discord.com/invite/gDWAAF9SFq

( Meet newbies and experienced Game developers and have fun!!)

Controls:

WASD->To Move

ESC->Pause Menu

RMB->Attack

(You can attack without weapons also)

Q->Drop

E->Interact

scroll-weapon change

Camp recovers health in 3 seconds

.

.

.

Game Assets:

Unity Assets Store & Sketchfab
